text: Death Wish is a 1974 American crime-action movie directed by Michael Winner. It is based on the book Death Wish. It stars Charles Bronson. It was released on July 24, 1974 to positive reviews. It is the first movie in the Death Wish movie series. A remake was released in March 2018.
